pkgmetadata.longdescription: # opsvisOpenSeesPy (OpenSees) postprocessing and visualization module## Installation`pip install opsvis`Note: The previous name of this module was `ops_vis`, but to avoidissues with PyPi and readthedocs naming conventions, the name of thepackage and module to import is without the underscore.## Usage`import opsvis as opsv`## Documentationhttps://opsvis.readthedocs.io/en/latest/## OpenSeesPy documentationhttps://openseespydoc.readthedocs.io/en/latest/
